players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Diana, your silence in the last round is concerning. It makes me wonder if you're hiding something."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it. We must vote him out to protect the town."
Charlie: "Trust my investigation—Bob is the mafioso. We must vote him out now to protect the town."
You: "Diana, your continued silence is suspicious. Charlie, you're just trying to deflect—vote him out instead!"
